divs: sighting detailsit was a warm night in early june around 3 am. i was working as a night surpervisor for a machine shop in clarksville indiana. it was kind of stuffy inside the building with all the machines running,so i stepped out side to cool off. the area i was in has alot of air traffic in the area, mostly big u.p.s planes,and passenger jets going in and coming out of louisville international. the flight path for approach was right over the building,it was a normal night and they were stacked in formation 5 deep at times. i was smoking a cigarette and watching them go over the building when they broke pattern and left. it was a hazy night,but clear so you could see a good distance. one minute there were 10 planes in the sky,some orbiting, some in single file. the next they had all faded in the distance. when i noticed this strange colored light in the sky to the northwest,over downtown clarksville. it got my attention because it was a deep ruby red color,and instead of blinking on\off like airplane lights,it pulsed from very bright to dim. it was as bright as white,aircraft landing lights only it was deep red. it moved with a non ballistic motion,it moved forward when it was bright,and completely stopped when dim. i was watching it move to the east for a few minutes,i was so amazed with the motion,that i ran back into the building to get my my younger brother{he worked for me at the time},to come out and see this. he said the same thing i thought when i first saw it...holy sh$#. we stood there watching it asking each other if the other was seeing the strange movement. no noise whatsoever. it must have been more than 5 minutes by now,it was starting to move southeast towards us,and i actually ran back in the building again,and called my father! i was actually screaming in the phone for him to go outside and see this. i ran back outside and sure enough it was still there,and now almost directly over the building. im estimating it was 10000 feet at least 20 feet across. it was still just a sphere,no other lights on it,no structure visible. by now its moved over the building to the east,and we were both watching this intently,when a basketball sized sphere dropped out of the bottom. the smaller one was unlit,we only saw it because the larger sphere was so bright,it reflected off the smaller one. as it dropped the smaller sphere,it blinked out. we were looking for it to reappear,for maybe 15 to 30 seconds,when a fighter jet{f-4} came from the east right to the exact spot it had just been. the f-4 was very loud,and it slowed down approximately where the light had just been and it dipped it's wings back and forth,like he was scanning for this thing. he turned north ,then turned back to the east. and left the same way he came from. here we both are with our mouths wide open,looking at each other like"what the hell just happened". nothing ever hit the ground. there was no story about it in the news. louisville international airport had to see this thing. for the last 10 years i wondered what the hell that thing was,what it dropped. i still have no idea,but i do know that it was'nt anything of ours.
Summary: deep ruby red colored orb displaying non-ballistic motion,moves slowly across sky and drops smaller unlit sphere before disappearing.
